message:
I need some information regarding internships in Egypt.

What do I need to know to get an internship and how well should I know it?
What companies offer internships?
If I get an internship what exactly would my job be...given that I'm in year 2 Computer Science Ain Shams?

Thanks in advance :)

data.message:
Most internships I've seen here are either for final year students in software-driven/focused companies (so it's more like a relatively underpaid trial work period than anything), and IT internships. Bear in mind the difference between jobs that involve development and IT.
Last year, I got an 8-week internship in the IT dept at Unilever, and while they do have a dev team I was placed in Networking/Support. I guess it really depends on where you're applying/what department/if they have dev teams/if they outsource IT desk support.
To get an internship you need to, well, apply to one. A couple of deadlines have passed, but you should be able to find something if you look now. Depending on the company, after the application there might be some sort of test and/or interview.
You should find some opportunities in pages like this: https://www.facebook.com/STJEGYPT/?fref=ts

http://www.internshipsegypt.com/#!software/c1vo6

Here you will find some internships with the requirements

you can check both those websites: 
http://internsvalley.com/opportunities/
http://www.internshipsegypt.com/
